data.title: buttons
data.contents:
Follow some application examples of buttons

Types

Base

Base button layout sample:

.btn-primary {
  @include states(#1A75CE, #086B9C);
}
<button type="button" class="buy-button btn btn-success">
  <span class="icon"></span>
  <span class="text">Button</span>
</button>
